contents.Text: Enabled: This shows the ui to toggle individual dynamic fonts.
Disabled: Hides the ui and disables all dynamic font loading.
This is enabling dynamic font searching/loading of the "Japanese" language if found it will load the font on startup.
Right click on a font to show the editing menu.
[[[strong:Edit Region:]]]This is the region/name of the font you are editing.
[[[strong:Edit font_names:]]]This is the font names it will search for and load if found.
[[[warning:Note:]]]It searches the fonts in order from top to bottom so if a higher font is found it will use that and not load lower fonts.
[[[strong:Remove:]]]This will remove the entire region permanently.
These are fonts that are not ticked thus will not be searched or loaded.
Click this button to add a new font region.
Enter the new region name then press enter to create it.
Click [[[strong:Close]]] to cancel and close the [[[strong:Add new font region]]].
